resources.string: You can play either noughts or crosses. Cross player moves first.
When quadrant\'s arrows are active, you can rotate it instead of marking a field
Try to put 5 of your marks straight in line to win the game
Play with a friend on one device
Could not sign in due to connection error
This feature is not available in this version of the game.
Old classic with a twist… literally! 6x6 version of TicTacToe where you can turn parts of the board around.
Exercise your brain while playing solo or challenge your friends to a mind-duel - hot seat or online. Enjoy customizable flat design and several levels of bot\'s difficulty.
Will you become the ultimate TicTacTurn master?
